Key Match Events: Jalen Green and Fred VanVleet each scored 21 points.
The Rockets built a 25-point lead by halftime.
Victor Wembanyama had 15 points, six rebounds, and three blocks for the Spurs.
The Rockets were up by 27 points when coach Ime Udoka cleared the bench with about 6½ minutes remaining.
Fred VanVleet had 10 assists and seven rebounds — both season-highs.
The Rockets used a 7-0 run in the first quarter to extend their lead to 22-8.
Miscellaneous Highlights: San Antonio’s defense suffered without top on-ball defender Jeremy Sochan, who suffered a fractured left thumb.
Rookie Stephon Castle started in place of Jeremy Sochan.
Houston finally put together a complete game after failing to play consistently for four quarters in the last two games.
The Rockets dominated inside, outscoring the Spurs 66-46 in the paint.
